products.name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
products.description: A gentle cleanser for normal to dry skin with ceramides and hyaluronic acid.

products.name: L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Triple Power Moisturizer
products.description: Anti-aging moisturizer with Pro-Retinol, Vitamin C, and Hyaluronic Acid.

products.name: Garnier Fructis Sleek & Shine Shampoo
products.description: Shampoo for frizzy, dry hair with argan oil and active fruit protein.

products.name: Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation
products.description: Longwear liquid foundation with full coverage and a natural matte finish.

products.name: L'Oréal Paris Excellence Creme Hair Color
products.description: Permanent hair color with triple protection system for rich, radiant color.

products.name: Kérastase Discipline Fluidissime Spray
products.description: Anti-frizz spray for smoothness and shine, suitable for all hair types.

products.name: Kiehl's Facial Fuel Energizing Moisture Treatment for Men
products.description: Moisturizer for men with vitamins C and E, chestnut extract, and soy.

products.name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Melt-in Milk Sunscreen SPF 60
products.description: Broad spectrum SPF 60 sunscreen for face and body, suitable for sensitive skin.

products.name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Eau de Parfum
products.description: A bold floral fragrance with lavender essence and orange blossom.

name: Anthelios Ultra-Light Fluid Face Sunscreen SPF 60
description: Ultra-light SPF 60 fluid with Cell-Ox Shield® and antioxidants. Fast-absorbing, non-greasy, invisible finish; works under makeup. Water-resistant for 40 minutes; oil- and fragrance-free. Suitable for sensitive and oily skin without a white cast.

description.name: Effaclar Duo Dual Acne Treatment
description.description: Acne treatment with 5.5% benzoyl peroxide and lipo-hydroxy acid. Spot or full-face lotion clears breakouts, prevents blemishes, and refines texture. Niacinamide soothes; oil-free, fast-absorbing; reduces acne and marks without over-drying.

description.name: Minéral 89 Hyaluronic Acid Booster
description.description: Lightweight gel booster with 89% volcanic mineral water and hyaluronic acid. Strengthens the barrier, provides plumping hydration with 15 minerals. Quick-absorbing, non-sticky; alcohol- and fragrance-free. Leaves skin fresh, soothed, and deeply hydrated.

description.name: Aqualia Thermal Rich Cream
description.description: Rich hydration cream for dry to very dry, sensitive skin. 97% natural-origin ingredients include hyaluronic acid, plant sugars, and mineral-rich water for 48-hour moisture. Soothes tightness, smooths fine lines; paraben-free, allergy-tested. Leaves skin velvety soft.

description.name: Revitalift 1.5% Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description.description: Lightweight serum with 1.5% hyaluronic acid (macro and micro) and vitamin C for multi-depth hydration. Instantly replenishes moisture, visibly plumps, and reduces fine lines. Fragrance-free, non-tacky; skin feels smoother and more youthful over time. Suitable for sensitive skin.

description.name: Elvive Total Repair 5 Shampoo
description.description: Repairing shampoo targeting split ends, weakness, roughness, dullness, and dehydration. Protein and ceramide concentrate cleanse and fortify hair fibers. Creamy lather smooths and adds shine without weight. With conditioner, delivers stronger, silkier, more manageable hair.

description.name: Voluminous Original Mascara (Carbon Black)
description.description: Mascara that instantly builds 5× fuller lashes with panthenol and ceramide-R. Exclusive brush coats and separates without clumping. Rich Carbon Black pigment for dramatic depth. Ophthalmologist-tested, fragrance-free; soft, plush lashes removable with soap and water.

description.name: Infallible Fresh Wear Foundation (24H)
description.description: Long-wear foundation with medium-to-full buildable coverage and a fresh matte finish. Oxygen technology and oil absorbers resist sweat, water, and transfer for 24 hours. Lightweight, non-comedogenic, enriched with antioxidants. Keeps skin even, smooth, and shine-free all day.

description.name: Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation
description.description: Liquid foundation for normal to oily skin with a natural matte, pore-blurring finish. Micro-powders absorb oil and minimize pores; medium and buildable coverage. Oil-free, non-comedogenic, available in 40 shades. Delivers a smooth, breathable, shine-controlled complexion.

description.name: Lash Sensational Mascara
description.description: Mascara with an exclusive fanning brush for layered, full-fan volume and length. Ten bristle layers capture and separate every lash without clumping. Black washable formula builds volumized, supple lashes. Ophthalmologist-tested for sensitive eyes; dramatic yet clump-free effect.

description.name: Advanced Génifique Youth Activating Serum
description.description: Anti-aging serum with bifidus prebiotic, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C. Boosts radiance, elasticity, and barrier in 7 days. Hydrates, plumps, and smooths fine lines; lightweight and fast-absorbing. Suitable for all skin types; skin looks firmer and more luminous.

description.name: Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation
description.description: 24-hour wear foundation with buildable full coverage and natural matte finish. Perlite and silica absorb oil; EternalSoft polymers ensure comfort and no cakey feel. Transfer-resistant, oil- and fragrance-free; 50+ shades for inclusive matching. Leaves skin perfected and even.

description.name: SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water
description.description: All-in-one micellar water that removes dirt, oil, and makeup without rinsing. Micelles act like magnets to lift impurities gently. Oil-, alcohol-, and fragrance-free; dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested. Leaves skin purified, soothed, and never tight.

description.name: Fructis Sleek & Shine Shampoo
description.description: Smoothing shampoo that tames frizz for up to 72 hours in humidity. Infused with argan oil and plant-based keratin protein to nourish and strengthen. Creamy lather cleanses while coating strands to seal cuticles. Leaves hair silky, shiny, and flyaway-free; use with conditioner for best results.

description.name: Ultra Facial Cream
description.description: Iconic daily moisturizer delivering lightweight 24-hour hydration with squalane and glacial glycoprotein. Strengthens the moisture barrier and protects against environmental stress. Fast-absorbing, non-greasy, fragrance-free; suitable for all skin types. Leaves skin noticeably softer and healthier-looking.

description.name: Nutritive Bain Satin 1 Shampoo
description.description: Nourishing shampoo for normal to slightly dry hair with plant proteins and niacinamide. Irisome Complex infuses strands with glucose and lipids for softness and shine. Gently cleanses while protecting with antioxidant-rich iris rhizome extract. Leaves hair supple, detangled, and radiant.

description.name: C E Ferulic Antioxidant Serum
description.description: Daytime antioxidant serum with 15% vitamin C, 1% vitamin E, and 0.5% ferulic acid. Neutralizes free radicals from UV and pollution, offering 72-hour protection. Brightens, firms, and reduces fine lines for a youthful glow. Clinically proven to boost radiance and environmental defense.

description.name: Naked Eyeshadow Palette (Original)
description.description: 12-shade neutral palette with mattes, satins, and metallics. Pigment Infusion System™ delivers rich color payoff and buttery blendability. Long-lasting wear with a built-in mirror and double-ended brush. Versatile for day-to-night bronze looks.

description.name: Rouge Volupté Shine Lipstick Balm
description.description: Oil-infused lipstick balm with 65% conditioning oils for up to 8-hour hydration. Creamy, lightweight texture offers buildable medium coverage and high-gloss shine. Nourishes lips while delivering vibrant color. Packaged in a signature YSL golden tube.

description.name: All Soft Conditioner
description.description: Moisturizing conditioner with Moisture Complex and argan oil to detangle and soften hair. Smooths cuticles, reduces frizz, and boosts shine without weighing down strands. When used with the All Soft Shampoo, provides up to 15× more conditioning. Leaves hair silky, manageable, and healthy-looking.

description.name: Excellence Crème Permanent Triple Care Hair Color
description.description: Triple Care Color routine with Pro-Keratine Complex delivers 100% gray coverage for all hair types and protects hair before, during, and after coloring for up to eight weeks. Includes an after-color shampoo to gently cleanse residue and reveal rich, radiant tone.

description.name: Elnett Satin Extra Strong Hold Classic Hairspray
description.description: Classic hairspray offering extra-strong, brushable hold that resists humidity and rain with just six ingredients. Leaves hair touchable and shiny without stiffness, stickiness, or residue, and features UV protection to preserve color.

description.name: Men Expert Hydra Energetic After Shave Balm
description.description: Cooling after-shave balm that soothes razor burn, irritation, redness, and tightness while delivering long-lasting hydration. Its lightweight formula repairs and protects skin, leaving it comfortable and refreshed.

description.name: RevitaLift Triple Power Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen
description.description: Anti-aging facial sunscreen with pro-retinol, vitamin C, and hyaluronic acid to reduce wrinkles, firm skin, and boost radiance within one week. Broad-spectrum SPF 30 shields against UVA and UVB rays.

description.name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
description.description: Radiant floral-gourmand fragrance featuring notes of iris, patchouli, vanilla, and spun sugar. Delivers a joyful, long-lasting scent that blends elegance with warmth.
